column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////As opposed to Girl and the Goat
column2: which was hardly any food for a lot of money
column4: you at least get your money's worth
column6: I had the cheeseburger with sides of creamed spinach and corn and fries
column8: I got the chocolate pie for dessert which was good too
column9: I tried my friend's fried chicken and bacon which were both really good too
